all-packages.description:
Thank you for looking into the as3commons-logging system!

We hope you'll like it!

Lets begin! There are various packages listed below for various tasks that might come up when working with this logging framework. org.as3commons.logging contains all that is necessary for a enduser: Just log and done!

API Changes

For version 2.5 we changed the API for performance reasons. it is now in the .api package which allows us to deploy a compatibility package.

package.name: org.as3commons.logging.api
package.shortDescription: Main access points to the logging framework.

package.name: org.as3commons.logging.level
package.shortDescription: All log levels of the system.

package.name: org.as3commons.logging.integration
package.shortDescription: Integration to other logging systems (for routing log events of the other systems to the as3commons logging system)

package.name: org.as3commons.logging.setup
package.shortDescription: Setup mechanisms to define/manipulate the log output.

package.name: org.as3commons.logging.setup.target
package.shortDescription: Various output targets that can be used in the setup process.

package.name: org.as3commons.logging.simple
package.shortDescription: A set of tools to log without a big hazzle.

package.name: org.as3commons.logging.util
package.shortDescription: Utils for more specific logging systems.

package.name: org.as3commons.logging.util.xml
package.shortDescription: Utils to work with xml based setups.
